name: horrorgame.exe

screenshots.caption: One of the randomly created objects.
The floor, ceiling and walls are randomly generated. But the atmosphere is always eerie.

short_description:
Playing in your own dream world was fun.
Until it started stalking you. 
You want to leave, but the door was locked.

You have to find a key and a door in a large dark room filled with randomly generated objects and walls. And an enemy, of course, which wanders around the map and starts chasing you if he sees you.

You only have a compass and a lamp, which you can refill with oil cans scattered around the room.

You can also run, but the more your stamina is drained, the slower you'll run.

The door emits a bell sound when you're getting closer to it, and the key leaves marks on the floor that lead to it.

But you can never exactly tell from the sound is coming, and the marks can sometimes be misleading and hard to follow.

The monster also emits a sound when he approaches you, but he can make you deaf for a moment if you stare at it.

Gameplay videos:

v2.0
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tGK-ZqTF_6Q

v1.5
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XEKVD63ryhQ
summary: A small bizarre early-3D horror game.
